Maverick Theater.knownFor: “ Fullerton finally has real Theater! ” Reviewed August 23, 2012 Saw "the King" a ROCK-N-ROLL comedy about the return of ELVIS. Wow! There is FINALLY true theater in Fullerton. With lots of innovative set design using rear screen projection and a multi-level set, a great sound system, plus a bar - this place rocks!
